parameters.name: AcceleratorId
parameters.description: The ID of the GA instance.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return. Valid values: **1** to **50**. Default value: **20**.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The pagination token that is used in the next request to retrieve a new page of results. Valid values:

*   You do not need to specify this parameter for the first request.
*   You must specify the token that is obtained from the previous query as the value of NextToken.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region where the GA instance is deployed. Set the value to **cn-hangzhou**.

parameters.name: Role
parameters.description:
The type of the certificate. Valid values:

*   **default**
*   **additional**

If you do not specify this parameter, default and additional certificates are returned by default.
